username.alreadyExists: An account with this username already exists.

email.verification: Enter a new email address. We'll send you an email to verify it.
email.same: You are already using this email address.

manageAccount.title: Manage Account
manageAccount.resetPasswordDialog: We'll send you an email with a link which you can use to create a new password for your account.
manageAccount.deleteAccountDialog: Please confirm the deletion of your account by typing the following into the field:
manageAccount.irreversibleAction: Please remember that this action is irreversible.

bugReporting.title: Bug Reporting
bugReporting.bugReportingModeDescription: Help us find and fix bugs. Bug Reporting Mode activates a small widget in the bottom corner of your screen which you can click to copy console logs.
